text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Encamp | official_name = | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Parish | image_skyline = Vista d'Encamp - Andorra.jpg | image_alt = The town of Encamp and the Valira d'Orient river valley | image_caption = The town of Encamp and the Valira d'Orient river valley | nickname = | image_flag = Flag of Encamp.svg | image_shield = Escut d'Encamp.svg |shield_size = 80px | image_seal = | motto = | image_map = Encamp in Andorra.svg | mapsize = 270px | map_alt = Encamp in Andorra in Andorra | map_caption = Encamp parish, in red, in Andorra | pushpin_map = | pushpin_map_narrow = yes | pushpin_mapsize = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Andorra | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | parts_type = Villages | parts_style = para | parts = | p1 = See list | p2 = | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Encamp | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_party = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Jordi Torres Arauz | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 86 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 1238 |elevation_max_m = |elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 12212 | population_as_of = 2015 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = encampadà, encampadana | population_blank1_title = | population_blank1 = | demographics_type1 = | demographics1_footnotes = | demographics1_title1 = | demographics1_info1 = | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = AD200 | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = AD-02 | website = Official website | footnotes = }} Encamp is one of the seven parishes of Andorra. It is in the east central part of the country. Encamp is also the name of the main town of the parish. ==Geography== The Encamp parish is in the east central part of the country and borders with the Canillo parish to the north, with the Pyrénées-Orientales department (France) to the east, with Spain to the southeast, with the Escaldes-Engordany parish to the south, with the La Massana parish to the west and the Ordino parish to the northwest. The highest mountain in the parish is Pic del Pessons () with an elevation of above sea level. The main river in Encamp is the Valira d'Orient. ==Population== The parish had a population, in 2015, of 12,212 inhabitants, for a population density of persons/km². Here is the Sant Romà church (XII century). 3 El Pas de la Casa 2,403 2,081 It is on the border with France. 4 Vila 1,062 1,328 Here is the Sant Romà de Vila. ==Economy== The main economic activity is tourism and the parish is a major tourism destination. ==Sites of interest== * Sant Romà de Vila church in Vila * Sant Romà de les Bons church in Les Bons * Museu Nacional de l’Automòbil d’Andorra, a automobile museum in Encamp * Santa Eulàlia d'Encamp church in Encamp * Grandvalira ski resort ==Gallery== File:Comú d'Encamp - Andorra.jpg|Encamp town hall File:Pas de la case.jpg|El Pas de la Casa File:Sant Romà de Vila, Encamp.jpg|Sant Romà de Vila church File:Sant Romà de les Bons - Encamp - Andorra.jpg|Sant Romà de les Bons church ==References== Category:Parishes of Andorra
